name: sub_player_chrome_extension
description: Add subtitle overlay from SRT files to any video element, with options to sync the subtitle.

scripts.build:templates: mustache -p  src/popup/templates/header.mustache -p  src/popup/templates/footer.mustache -p  src/popup/templates/subtitle_tabs.mustache -p  src/popup/templates/video_search.mustache -p  src/popup/templates/key_playback.mustache -p  src/popup/templates/general_style_controls.mustache src/popup/templates/template_data.json src/popup/templates/popup.mustache > dist/popup/popup.bundled.html
scripts.build:browserify: browserify src/popup/js/popup.js -o dist/popup/js/popup.bundled.js && browserify src/background.js -o dist/background.bundled.js
scripts.build: npm run build:templates && npm run build:browserify

author: Mazen Besher
